job_history.role_name: Marketing and Corporate Communications/Merchant Services Transition - Communications Project Manager
job_history.work_description: Manage, write, and edit external client communications and content to meet transactional needs of multiple business merchants. Also manage project risk through comprehensive mitigation assessment and planning techniques.
Institutional Client Services, Marketing Project management for product implementations, asset consolidations and email campaign project requests.

skills.name: Project Management
skills.explanation: Over 15 years of experience in managing projects, including project risk mitigation, content management, and team coordination, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Communication
skills.explanation: Extensive experience in writing, editing, and managing external client communications, suggesting expert-level proficiency in communication.

skills.name: Marketing
skills.explanation: Significant experience in marketing, including product implementations, asset consolidations, and email campaign project requests, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Experience in managing project risk through comprehensive mitigation assessment and planning techniques, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Experience in managing teams and projects, indicating strong leadership skills.

skills.name: Six Sigma
skills.explanation: Holds a Six Sigma Green Belt Certification, showing a solid working proficiency in process improvement.

skills.name: Time Management
skills.explanation: Experience in managing multiple projects and tasks, suggesting a solid working proficiency in time management.

skills.name: Team Management
skills.explanation: Experience in managing teams, indicating a solid working proficiency in team management.
